mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wm. Radam's Microbe Killer jug
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: William Radam [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A brown jug incised with "W.M. Radam's Microbe Killer." It was collected in Page County, Virginia, and donated to the library with a book titled "Microbes and the Microbe Killer" by William Radam, published in New York by the author in 1890.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Containers
